en.meta_title: Aurum Atelier Watches | Swiss-Inspired Luxury Timepieces
en.meta_description: Explore Swiss-inspired luxury watches with precision movements, sapphire crystal, and timeless design. Worldwide shipping and 2-year warranty.
en.hero_subtitle: From boardroom to weekend getaway, each Aurum Atelier watch blends minimalist design with dependable movements and premium materials.

zh.meta_title: Aurum Atelier 手表 | 瑞士灵感的高端腕表
zh.meta_description: 探索瑞士灵感的高端腕表，精准机芯、蓝宝石镜面与经典设计。全球配送，2年保修。
zh.hero_title: 为沉稳自信而生的腕表。
zh.hero_subtitle: 从商务到旅行，Aurum Atelier 将极简设计、可靠机芯与优质材质完美融合。
